<rule id="javax-to-jakarta-dependencies-00003" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="pom.xml" pattern="artifactId>jaxb-api<"/>                   
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="javax.xml.bind jaxb-api artifactId has been replaced by jakarta.xml.bind jakarta.xml.bind-api">
                    <message>Replace the `jaxb-api` artifact dependency with `jakarta.xml.bind-api`</message>
                    <link href="https://jakarta.ee/" title="Jakarta EE"/>
                    <quickfix name="javax-to-jakarta-pom-dependencies-jaxb-api-a" type="REPLACE">
                           <replacement>jakarta.xml.bind-api</replacement>
                           <search>jaxb-api</search>
                    </quickfix>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
